title: Bug 122105: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
description: Bug 122105: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
OB: In the 'Edit data set' window, when dragging a stored procedure to the QueryText field, the stored procedure name does not include the database schema name.
EB: The stored procedure name should be composed of the database schema name and the stored procedure name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a data source.
2. Create a data set using the stored procedure.
3. Drag the stored procedure to the QueryText field in the 'Edit data set' window.
